at that perfect moment right before

i never thought i'd miss that stuff so much.

who couldn't even remember his own name.

i knew i would follow you anywhere.
if i could do it all over again, i would
and i wouldn't change a thing.
is that when you're looking back years from now,
you'll be able to say the same.

and i know you'll find a way to do what's right.
take care of everyone for me.
thank you for being my friend.
